wikiDescription: Instantly teleports you to the server's spawn, a safe and central area. This is useful for meeting up with other players, accessing server-wide amenities, or making a quick escape from danger.

Instead of manually claiming land, the server intelligently learns where your base is by tracking activities like placing valuable blocks, using a bed, or placing containers. Once your 'base score' is high enough, a protected area is automatically established. This protection prevents griefing and theft while you are offline. Use /base to teleport to your primary base area, /base sethome to choose the exact teleport spot within your base, and /trust [player] to grant friends access.

Set a single, personal teleport point anywhere in the world. This is perfect for a small outpost, a favorite mining spot, or a temporary shelter. Unlike the area-based /base command, /sethome marks just one block. Use /home to return to it. (This feature may require a linked Discord account).

Feeling adventurous? Use this command to be instantly transported to a random, unclaimed location in the wilderness. It's the perfect way to find a fresh area to start your base or to discover new biomes and structures far from spawn.

Quickly team up with friends using teleport requests. Use /tpa [player] to ask to teleport to them. They will receive a request they can accept with /tpaccept or deny with /tpdeny. Be aware that requests usually expire after a short time.
Made a teleport you regret? Or maybe you died and want to get back to your items quickly? This command teleports you to your location prior to your last teleport or death, giving you a second chance.
Send a private message to another player that only they can see. Use /msg [player] [message] to start a conversation. You can quickly reply to the last person who messaged you using /r [message].

Connect your Minecraft and Discord accounts to unlock special features. Linking your account syncs your server rank to a Discord role, lets you see the in-game chat in a dedicated Discord channel, and may be required for certain commands like /home. Use the command in-game to get a code, then send it to the bot on Discord.

Access the server's economy via a convenient graphical interface. You can buy and sell a wide variety of items, from basic resources to powerful gear. The shop uses ⛃ SkillCoins as its main currency. Browse categories like Combat, Enchantments, Resources, and Tools to find what you need.
Securely transfer ⛃ SkillCoins to another player. This is perfect for trading, paying for services, or helping out a friend. You can view your current balance with /skillcoins balance (or /sc bal).

This server uses AuraSkills to add a deep RPG-like progression. Performing actions like mining, fighting, or farming will grant you XP in the corresponding skill. As you level up skills, you'll gain permanent stat boosts (like more health or damage) and unlock powerful new abilities. Use /skills to open the main menu and explore the different skill trees.

Engage in a huge variety of quests, including tasks for mining, combat, crafting, fishing, and more. The quest list is dynamic, with new challenges rotating in daily. Quests also unlock progressively as the community completes server-wide goals. Use /quest to see available quests, track your progress, and claim your rewards.

A server-wide boss hunt! The Rogue Wanderer is a mysterious and powerful NPC that roams the world. Your goal is to find and defeat it. You'll receive hints to its location using /hint, with new hints provided after each defeat and daily at 15:00 server time. Defeating the Wanderer three times yields a coveted Beam Stone.

Group up with friends by creating or joining a team. Being on a team allows you to use a private team chat and work together more easily. Use /team invite [player] to add members or /team chat to toggle your private chat channel.

Death isn't the end! When you die, a grave is automatically created at your death location, securely storing all of your items. Only you can access your grave's contents, protecting your loot from other players. This gives you time to get back to your items without fear of them despawning or being stolen.

Unleash your creativity in a separate world designed for building. Claim your own personal plot of land where you have creative mode access. It's the perfect place to test out redstone contraptions, design magnificent structures, or just build for fun without worrying about resources or monsters. Use /plot auto to claim the nearest available plot.
